text:
Perfect for what we liked to eat.  Unlike those other buffets where more is best, I don't see a point to have so many varieties and can't even try them all.

This place has a good balance of price and just the right dishes that we love to eat. Gives us focus to enjoy them.

The grill was excellent and for the first time for a bbq, the prawns were grilled perfectly, so perfect that the shells don't stick to the flesh. (Shells sticking the flesh typically is overcooked).  Compliments to the Chef!

I feel they needed perhaps one more staff to handle the Saturday service but nonetheless they were really good, accommodating and super friendly.

Perfect evening, celebrating my dad's 79th birthday!

Dogs are welcomed too which is a big bonus! Our border collie was a happy chappy.

Love the vibe and environment, will be back again soon!

I was there for their Grill Nâ€™ Chill Buffet Dinner at the Sanctuary Tearoom. All the grill items is made to order, so no food waste here! Choose between seafood and meat.
At the buffet there are the traditional roast meats, seafood,decadent desserts and much more.
We also had some festive Christmas cocktails and mocktails while sitting outside surrounded by the lush greenery. We picked to sit inside their newly renovated Sanctuary Tearoom while dining.

Very romantic and cosy restaurant. Not packed and AC is strong. Music played was smoothing Jazz. Food was served hot and well presented. Tasty too. Hospitality from Manager Angela was top notched. She made us felt so welcomed and important.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at this restaurant when I brought 2 seniors to Sentosa, it was an exceptional experience. The set lunches were not only delicious but also offered great value for money.

Additionally, I would like to extend my heartfelt appreciation to Jason, Angela and the service staff. Their warm and helpful demeanor truly elevated the dining experience, making it even more memorable for the two seniors.

Thank you for providing such a wonderful dining experience. I look forward to my next visit and will definitely recommend the Tearoom to others.

During our staycation, we had the pleasure of enjoying breakfast at the tearoom, and it was truly a delightful experience. The ambiance was serene and inviting, setting the perfect tone for a relaxing morning.

What stood out most was the impeccable service provided by the team of friendly and professional dining staff, led by the capable and charismatic AJ. A special shoutout to Jerome and Jennifer, who went above and beyond to ensure every guest was comfortable and well-attended to. Their genuine warmth, attention to detail, and positive work attitudes were remarkable.
